diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Cypress allergy with systemic reaction during skin prick test
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient presented with symptoms suggestive of an allergic reaction, including itching, erythema, cough, asthma, and edema after using latex gloves. A positive specific IgE for latex and a severe systemic reaction during a skin prick test for cypress—indicating a possible cross-reactivity between latex and cypress antigens—led to the final diagnosis.
